name: MD² – Model-driven Mobile Development
tagline: Cross-platform development of native business apps
body:
### Welcome to MD²'s Web site
MD² (MD2) is a model-driven framework for cross-platform development of mobile applications.
Based on a textual DSL, MD2 generates runnable native apps for Android and iOS.
* [Download MD2](http://wwu-pi.github.com/md2-web/res/MD2-plugins.zip) as a set of plug-ins for [Eclipse](http://www.eclipse.org).

### Background
MD2 has been developed by the [Group for Practical Computer Science](https://www.wi.uni-muenster.de/department/groups/pi) at the Department of Information Systems, University of Münster.
It has been presented at several scientific conferences.
The following publications describe MD2 in detail:
* _Cross-Platform Model-Driven Development of Mobile Applications with MD2._ In: Proceedings of the 28th ACM Symposium on Applied Computing (SAC), 2013.
* (German) _MD2-DSL – eine domänenspezifische Sprache zur Beschreibung und Generierung mobiler Anwendungen_ In: Proceedings der 6. Arbeitstagung Programmiersprachen (ATPS), Software Engineering 2013

### Materials
For now, this web site gives access to the following content:
* [MD2 plug-ins](http://wwu-pi.github.com/md2-web/res/MD2-plugins.zip) for Eclipse
* [Documentation](http://wwu-pi.github.com/md2-web/res/MD2-Documentation.pdf)
* [Screencasts](http://www.wi1.uni-muenster.de/pi/forschung/md2/screencasts/)

In the future, the source code will be made available as open source.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
